p: Ethyl 2-(diethoxyphosphoryl)-3-(pyridin-4-yl)propanoate (30). Purification with acetone/ethyl acetate (15:85 → 20:80) afforded the desired compound as a yellow oil in 20% yield. 1H NMR (300 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 8.50 (d, J = 5.7 Hz, 2H), 7.14 (d, J = 6.0 Hz, 2H), 4.36 − 3.94 (m, 6H), 3.42 − 3.06 (m, 3H), 1.35 (t, J = 7.1 Hz, 6H), 1.16 (t, J = 7.1 Hz, 3H).
